page.title: 07SCHOOL GIRL (continued)
page.content: In the afternoon we do things like language work or finishing off things.We also have a story.At the moment we are listening to one called the "Demon Headmaster".The bus comes at 3.15.p.m.I get home about 3.40.p.m.When I get in I take off my coat and wash my lunch box.Then I have to do another half hour piano practice.At 4.15 we have tea.Jonathan, my brother, gets ready for Cubs.We go to Sutton St.James.While we wait for Cubs to finish we go to Terri's Aunt's and Nan's (We call them Mary and Min).Mum usually chats for hours!We get home about 8.00.p.m. and get ready for bed.Jonathan,Nicholas and I go to bed at 9.00.p.m.I get to sleep about 9.30.p.m.
